trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Johnston
There were no other sightings in Johnston on or around August 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Plainfield pike heading the direction of walmart & saw bright flashing lights hovering along the tree line in a circular shape. I ended up taking the high way and lost sight of the object.
Summary: Was driving and saw bright lights in a circular shape on the tree line.
